ComicInfo.Summary:
While the others are at the hospital healing their wounds Barbaric and Horridus go off in search of Bludgeon. They are soon joined by Killcat, Super Patriot, Kid Avenger, Vanguard and the Maxx in their fight against Bludgeon. But even their combined power isn't enough to stop this overpowered freak. All seems lost until Rapture brings Joey into the fight who defeats Bludgeon with a flick of his wrist.
Contains a Wildstar vs Freak Force poster by Al Gordon and Chris Marrinan
